ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1282
ygData.msgSnippet: I m going to find out. G. Bringing alcmeny points up is slooooooooow work. I have a lot of Clarity I potions in my backpack now. I can t wait until I can make
ygData.messageBody:
I'm going to find out. G. Bringing alcmeny points up is slooooooooow
work. I have a lot of Clarity I potions in my backpack now. I can't
wait until I can make stuff that I actually have a use for. G.

Thanks for the help everyone. My alchemy stat is advancing.

Edward Fox

> From what I remember, you get a skillup faster by doing trivials
closer to
> your skill level, because according to the formula used, you have a
better
> chance to get a skill-up from a success than from a failure.
Eqtraders.com
> has a very nice tradeskill guide on their message board in the
tradeskill
> guide section. If I remember correctly, it's possible to get to 210
using
> nothing but store bought components, but don't quote me on that.
>
> --Viirus Steelhart
> 75 Druid
> Tunare
>
